price: 26. Realmente, en ello hay un motivo de reflexión para quienes temen (a Al-lah).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
